title: Jailed For 3 Months In Mexico, U.S. Marine Reservist Gets Hearing
teaser: Andrew Tahmooressi maintains he took a wrong turn and mistakenly drove into Tijuana with his guns, which are legally registered in the U.S. The case has inflamed cross border tensions.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
